extendedInfo.description: Battery Indicator shows your mobile battery charging level in percentage as an icon every-time you check in your application.Battery Indicator lite application is very light weight thus it will not occupy much of your mobile space still gives you an important information on your mobile

reviews.title: Fuck you developer.
